title: Botsuraku Yotei No Kizoku Dakedo, Himadatta Kara Mahou Wo Kiwamete Mita - Chris Wa Goshujin-Sama Ga Daisuki!
alternative_title: 没落予定の貴族だけど、暇だったから魔法を極めてみた～クリスはご主人様が大好き！～
status: 没落予定の貴族だけど、暇だったから魔法を極めてみた～クリスはご主人様が大好き！～
description:
Description :
        Chris-chan, a girl who is also a werewolf, is always busy under the care of her beloved master, Liam-kun! She works for the country alongside Lord Shenlong and other familiars, swims in the sea, explores mountains, takes baths, and even takes naps… Every day is filled with joyous activities.Today, as she snuggles up to her master’s lap, she can’t decide what to play next. Join Chris-chan in her fluffy and delightful everyday life!
